summary: Fixed 500 Internal Server Error for booking conversation endpoint by uploading the corrected file to server. The issue was 'Undefined variable $customerInfo' - moved $customerInfo initialization to the top of the try block (line 450) so it's always available before being used at line 546. Cleared all Laravel caches to ensure changes take effect.
current_status: Beauty Booking module testing in progress. Fixed conversation endpoint 500 error. The endpoint should now work correctly. Continue testing booking flow and chat functionality.
